437.name: Varinder Singh Bedi
437.treatment:
• Aortic Aneurysms – Surgical And Endovascular Management: Performed Abdominal, Thoracic Aortic Aneurysms Surgeries And Endovascular Treatment At Army Hospital R&R INHS Asvini And Sir Ganga Ram Hospital For The Last 27 Years. Our Present Center Performs One Of The Largest Number Of Endovascular Aneurysm Repairs In The Country.
 • Carotid Surgery: Learnt ‘Eversion Endarterectomy’ Technique In Germany. Only Vascular Surgeon In India Using This Technique. Have The Largest Series Of Eversion Endarterectomies In India. Converted Modified Eversion Endarterectomy In India Since 2014 And The Only Centre Performing This Procedure. 
• Hybrid Vascular Procedures For Supra Renal Aortic Aneurysms & Thoracic Aortic Aneurysms: First In The Country To Perform Visceral Hybrids For Thoraco Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms. Have The Largest Series Of Complex Aneurysms Cases In India For Visceral Hybrid Surgery. We Regularly Perform On-Table Fenestration For Endovascular Therapies, Chimney And Sandwich Therapies For Aortic Aneurysms.
